title: Episcopal Farmworker Ministry - Native to Mexico and Guatemala, epazote is commonly used in food and tea! Epazote has been used to treat digestive issues! However large amounts can be toxic to the body. Epazote can be used fresh and added to beans or dried and made into a warm soothing tea. The word epazote is derived from Nahuatl! Did you learn something new today? Support the preservation of ancestral knowledge about medicinal herbs! Make a donation today at https://hipgive.org/en/campaign/gomujeres_2021/episcopal_farmworker_ministry ******* Nativo de Sur Mexico y Guatemala, el epazote es usado en comida y te! El epazote se usa para curar mal estar del estómago pero puede ser tóxico en cantidades grandes. Se puede usar fresco en frijoles o resecado para un té. La palabra epazote es del idioma náhuatl!
